TORNADOES...HAIL TO 3 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 60KT POSS.

AREA 1...FROM 60S YWG-70SE INL-50NE HLC-DBL-60NE CZI-PIR-60S YWG 
REF WW 270 271. 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 30SSW STL-30WNW BWG-CEW-40E PSX-40ESE OSW-30SSW STL 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. REFER 
TO MOST RECENT WTNT23 KNHC FROM NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER FOR 
DETAILS ON T.D. CRISTOBAL.
